MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW5 postcode area of Nantwich, affecting properties in Weaver road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:56PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing fault investigate and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:38am on 14th February 2021.
